actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Concurrent resolution stating the sense of Congress regarding the situation in Southeast Asia.

summary.text: Condemns violations of the Paris agreement by the Communists in Vietnam. Calls upon all governments to join in this condemnation. Demands the immediate withdrawal of Communists forces to the cease-fire line established by the Paris agreement, and the withdrawal from South Vietnam of all forces and equipment in excess of those present at the time of the agreement. Notifies the governments of the Soviet Union and the Peoples' Republic of China that their actions in Vietnam shall be considered a test of faith in efforts toward detente. Calls upon individual nations and the United Nations to take action to assure the right of asylum to Vietnamese refugees.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution stating the sense of Congress regarding the situation in Southeast Asia.
